title: Virgin coconut oil: wet production methods and food applications – a review
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00093E, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
N. Sai Prasanna, Murugesan Selvakumar, Nilesh Choudhary, K. S. M. S. Raghavarao
Virgin coconut oil produced from fresh coconut without use of any heat, shear, or chemicals. It is unique functional oil with positive impact on health. VCO-based food formulations help in building sustainable food production and human diets.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
